string.name: noIncubator
string.value: 피그미 에그를 부화시키려면 캐시샵에서\n부화기를 구입하셔야 합니다.

string.name: wrongEgg
string.value: 부화시킬 수 없는 아이템입니다.

string.name: noEgg
string.value: 부화시킬 아이템을 먼저 선택하여 주십시요

string.name: sucess
string.value: 피그미 에그 안에서 아이템이 나왔습니다.

string.name: finalConfirm
string.value: 장비창 %d개, 소비창 %d개, 기타창 %d개,\n설치창 %d개의 빈 공간이 있어야 합니다.\n피그미 에그를 부화시키겠습니까?

string.name: noIncubator
string.value: You must purchase a Peanut Machine from the cash shop\r\n to crack open the peanut.

string.name: wrongEgg
string.value: This item can not be cracked.

string.name: noEgg
string.value: Please select an item that you want to crack.

string.name: sucess
string.value: The machine spits out an item covered in peanut shell dust.

string.name: finalConfirm
string.value:
You must have
 2 empty slots in Equip Inventory,
 2 empty slots in Use Inventory,
 and 1 empty slot in Set-up Inventory.
 Do you want to crack a peanut?

string.name: noIncubator
string.value: In order to defrost an Ice Cube,\nyou must purchase a Microwave\nfrom the Cash Shop.

string.name: wrongEgg
string.value: The selected item cannot be defrosted.

string.name: noEgg
string.value: Select an item to defrost.

string.name: sucess
string.value: You obtained an item from the Ice Cube.

string.name: finalConfirm
string.value:
Requires empty slots in the following Inventory tabs:
Equip x%d, Use x%d,
Set-up x%d, Etc x%d.
Do you still want to defrost the Ice Cube?

string.name: noIncubator
string.value: 피그미 에그를 부화시키려면 캐시샵에서\n부화기를 구입하셔야 합니다.

string.name: wrongEgg
string.value: 부화시킬 수 없는 아이템입니다.

string.name: noEgg
string.value: 부화시킬 아이템을 먼저 선택하여 주십시요

string.name: sucess
string.value: 피그미 에그 안에서 아이템이 나왔습니다.

string.name: finalConfirm
string.value: 장비창 %d개, 소비창 %d개, 기타창 %d개,\n설치창 %d개의 빈 공간이 있어야 합니다.\n피그미 에그를 부화시키겠습니까?

string.name: noIncubator
string.value: Legendary Hero Keys can open the \nLegends Music Box from the Cash Shop.

string.name: wrongEgg
string.value: This item cannot open the Music Box.

string.name: noEgg
string.value: Please get a Legendary Hero Key first.

string.name: sucess
string.value: An item came out of the Music Box.

string.name: finalConfirm
string.value:
You must have %d empty slots in the Equip tab, 
%d empty slots in the Use tab, 
%d empty slots in the Set-up tab, 
 and %d empty slots in the Etc tab.
Would you like to open the Legends Music Box?
